text.text_translated: The Hunger Games is an annual event organized by the Capitol. It is used to punish the districts for rebelling. Every year a boy and a girl aged 12 to 18 are chosen from each district by lottery. These teenagers are called tributes. The tributes must fight until only one survives. The whole nation must watch the event on television.
